original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa🔽Dhammapaccanīya (2), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)🔽11.8. Kusalattika, Hīnattikādi🔽Nakusalaṁ nahīnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe sattarasa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekavīsa.🔽Nakusalaṁ namajjhimaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā catuvīsa …pe… āsevane sattarasa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate catuvīsa.🔽Nakusalaṁ napaṇītaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.🔽Nakusalaṁ namicchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nasammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma paccanīya  kusala attika hīna attika ādi  na kusalam na hīnam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekavīsa ārammaṇe sattarasa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekavīsa  na kusalam na majjhimam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā catuvīsa pe āsevane sattarasa pe vipāke nava pe avigate catuvīsa  na kusalam na paṇītam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa  na kusalam na micchatta niyatam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na sammatta niyatam dhamma

original: paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa
translated: The Dhamma Paccanīya, the Tikatika Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭhāna Paṭṭ

original: Nakusalaṁ naaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca … (sabbattha sattarasa. Vipākaṁ natthi.)🔽Nakusalaṁ namaggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ namaggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ namaggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: na kusalam na aniyatam dhammam paṭicca sabbattha sattarasa vipākam natthi  na kusalam na magga ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na magga hetukam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na magga adhipatim dhammam paṭicca  hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa
translated: A profitable, indeterminate … (Seventeen, as in the case of the profitable, but there is no resultant.)🔽A profitable, not-path-of-purity-as-object … A profitable, not-path-of-purity-as-root … A profitable, not-path-of-purity-as-predominance … (Abbreviated.)🔽In the case of cause, twenty-nine; in the case of object, twenty-four; … in the case of kamma, twenty-four; … in the case of result, nine; … in the case of nutriment, twenty-four; … in the case of faculty, twenty-four; … in the case of jhāna, twenty-four; … in the case of path, twenty-four; … in the case of fruition, twenty-four; … in the case of association, twenty-four; … in the case of presence, twenty-four; … in the case of non-disappearance, twenty-nine.

original: Nakusalaṁ naanuppannaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nauppādiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Nakusalaṁ naatītaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ naanāgataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalam na anuppannam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na auppādim dhammam paṭicca  na kusalam na atītam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na anāgatam dhammam paṭicca
translated: A profitable, not-present … A profitable, not-arisen … (Abbreviated.)🔽A profitable, not-past … A profitable, not-future … (Abbreviated.)

original: Nakusalaṁ naatītārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ naanāgatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ napaccuppannārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalam na atīta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na anāgata ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na paccuppanna ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta nu
translated: A profitable, not-past-as-object … A profitable, not-future-as-object … A profitable, not-present-as-object … (Abbreviated.)
